English.Text: Too awful to be true. As the villagers rush, your men fire wildly, before realising they are both unarmed and intent only on recovering their food. One of them is hitâ€” a woman. There is nothing your medics can do for her. The sense of shame is only compounded on return to the ship, when a group of your men are found to have stolen supplies belonging to the villagers, in spite of everything. Your expedition can barely look one another in the eye.
